comments.body: Is there any real reason to skip this on non Linux platforms? now that we have that test and we think it's reliable, maybe it's worthwhile to test other platform, maybe we'll find bugs in Redis?

I considered this option, but thought it's still a potential for more noise. The real purpose of this test was to make sure we're handling the configuration properly, that can be achieved on a single platform.

A typo error... 
https://github.com/redis/redis/runs/2883563052

I think we can fix in next pr. New pr rebase unstable will also check out this error
